DOC.brief_summary: The aim study effect premedication success inferior alveolar nerve block injection . Sixty healthy adult volunteer include criterion , participate . The patient divide 3 group randomly give one premedications include 1 ) 10 mg Ketorolac , 2 ) 10 mg Ketorolac plus 1000mg Acetaminophen , 3 ) Placebo , 45 minute apply injection . All patient receive standard Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block injection . Patients lip numbness positive response cold electric pulp test would exclude study . Endodontic access preparation initiate 15 minute Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block injection . Pain treatment record use Heft parker Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Success consider mild pain ( VAS≤54 ) caries/dentin removal , access cavity preparation work lengths measurement . Data analyse use Mann-U-Whitney Kruskal-wallis test .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Premedication Success Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block Injection
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study effect premedication success inferior alveolar nerve block injection . Sixty healthy adult volunteer include criterion spontaneous pain , report mild ( Visual analog scale≤54 ) pain response cold test electric pulp tester , participate . The patient divide 3 group random basis randomly give one oral medication include 1 ) 10 mg Ketorolac , 2 ) 10 mg Ketorolac plus 1000mg Acetaminophen , 3 ) Placebo , 45 minute apply injection . All patient receive standard Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block injection one carpule 4 % Articaine 1:100000 Epinephrine . Patients anesthetic sign ( lip numbness ) positive response cold electric pulp test would exclude study . Endodontic access preparation initiate 15 minute Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block injection . Pain treatment record use Heft parker Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Success consider mild pain ( VAS≤54 ) caries/dentin removal , access cavity preparation work lengths measurement . Data analyse use Mann-U-Whitney Kruskal-wallis test .
DOC.criteria: Patients age range 1865 without systemic disease without medicine consumption non smoke non pregnant non breast feed asymptomatic irreversible pulpitis ( Visual Analog Scale ≤ 54 ) one mandibular molar need root canal treatment without medicine consumption analgesic sedation understand sign VAS consent form
